description:
Erza has an unexpected connection to Jellal, who used to be her comrade in the past. He rules over the Tower of Heaven, aka the R-system, in other words a forbidden magic used to resurrect someone from the dead! While Natsu and the gang try and infiltrate the tower to save Erza and Happy without really knowing what`s going on, the Council, now aware of the tower`s existence, begins to make a frightful decision in order to destroy it...
Source: crunchyroll
